name: Crazy Car: Desert Racing 3D S
description:
Crazy Car : Desert Racing 3D Stunt is designed for all the types of generations.the peoples who love the game of racing,this game is the best for them.there are bunch of different and attractive locations.easy,medium as well as hard levels and many more things.

Features
Attractive sports Cars
Awesome Locations
Well Controlled Steering
Limited time to clear your level
3D beautiful environment
Stunning graphics
